```{r}
library(sf)
library(leaflet)
```

```{r}
crs <- "+proj=longlat +datum=WGS84"
```

```{r message=F, echo=FALSE}
steps <- st_read('./data/data.kml',layer = '100m Steps', quiet=T)
steps <- st_transform(steps,crs)
route <- st_read('./data/rpl-19.kml', , quiet=T)
route <- st_transform(route,st_crs(steps))

route_b <- st_buffer(route,0.0005)
```

```{r}
leaflet() %>% addTiles() %>% addPolygons(data=route_b)
```
